name: Rat
text: Draw a card if your hand is empty. Extra 2: Worth +1 for each of your cards later in the story.

name: Beggar
text: Draw a card with the same cost as the next card in the story. Extra 1: Worth +1 point.

name: Fresh Air
text: Gain 3 breath. Draw a card if you have no cards later in the story.

name: Possibilities
text: Extra 4:  Double your points. Extra 1: Worth +1 point. Extra 2: Worth +2 points.

name: Hatchling
text: Extra 2: Create 2 Doves at the end of the story. Morning: This is permanently worth +1 point.

name: Eyes
text: Draw a card. While this is in your hand, whenever you play a card, gain Sight 1.

name: Capybara
text: Extra 1: Draw a card. Extra 4: Set both player's points to 0.

name: Rekindle
text: Discard each of your cards later in the story. Worth +1 for each of those cards. When played, your cards cost 0 this round.
